greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = numerator(Sum_{k=1..n} 1/k!).
link: M. F. Hasler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
formula: (exp(x)-1) / (1-x) is the o.g.f. for the sequence of fractions. - _Joerg Arndt_, Jun 01 2018
maple: a:= n-> numer(add(1/i!, i=1..n)): seq(a(n), n=1..23); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 28 2007
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jun 30 2006
